import react ,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {getUserList,deleteUser} from '../Actions/userActions' //My components import Loader from '../Components/Loader' import Message from '../Components/Message' function UserListscreen ({history}) { const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const {userInfo} = userLogin const userList = useSelector(state => state.userList) const {loading,error,users} = userList useEffect(()=>{ if(userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin) { dispatch(getUserList()) }else{ history.push('/login') } },[dispatch,userInfo,history]) function deleteHandler(id,name){ prompt(`Delete user ${name}?`) } return loading? () : error? ({error}) : ( {users.map(user => ( ))}
ID NAME EMAIL ADMIN EDIT/DELETE
{user._id} {user.name} {user.email} {user.isAdmin ? ( ) : ( )}
) } export default UserListscreen
